translations.translation: and the earth and what extended it.
The earth and its spreading out,
and by the earth and by Him Who stretched it out;
by the earth and that (Power) which spread it out
And by oath of the earth and by oath of Him Who spread it.
By the earth and Ma Tahhaha.
And the earth and Him Who extended it,
and by the earth and That which extended it!
And the earth and Him Who spread it,
and by the earth and how He spread it,
By the earth and Him Who spread it forth,
by the earth and Him who spread it,
By the Earth and its (wide) expanse:
And by the earth and Him Who spread it,
by the earth and Who spread it,
And the earth and He who spread it.
And [by] the earth and He who spread it
[91:6] and [by] the earth and the One Who spread it, laid out flat.

commentaries.author: ابن عباس
commentaries.text: وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا (6) وطَحْوُ الأرض : بسطها وتوطئتها للسير والجلوس والاضطجاع ، يقال : طحا يَطحو ويطحي طحواً وطَحْياً وهو مرادف «دحَا» في سورة النازعات ( 30 ) .

translations.translation: (And the earth and Him who spread it) over the water,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
عن أبي خالد عن زيد بن علي عليهما السّلام في قولهِ تعالى: { وَٱلأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا } معناه بَسطَها
 وكذلك دَحاها

translations.translation:
This is a quote from Abu Khalid, quoting Zaid ibn Ali, regarding the meaning of the verse from the Quran, "And the earth and whatever is upon it." { وَٱلأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا } refers to the spreading out of the earth.


And he also {dahaha} her.

commentaries.author: ابن عربي
commentaries.text: { والأرض } أي: البدن والخالق الذي طحاها

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَٱلأَرْضِ } أي: استعدادات القوابل السفلية
 القابلة لانعكاس آثار العلويات { وَمَا طَحَاهَا } [الشمس: 6] ونشرها من الآثار المرتبة على الصفات الفعَّالة الإلهية

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
وكذا في قوله: { والأرضِ وما طحاها } أي: بسطها من كل جانب
 كـ " دحاها "
